articles.author: Danny Rust
articles.title: Man Utd want 23-cap star who dominated Fred and McTominay at Old Trafford - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Manchester United want to sign a 23-cap star who has already dominated Fred and Scott McTominay during a Premier League clash this season, it has been claimed.
articles.content: Manchester United are looking to strengthen their midfield and Brighton & Hove Albion star Moises Caicedo is ‘on the list’ of targets at Old Trafford, according to talkSPORT reporter Alex Crook.… [+2908 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Bishop
articles.title: PSG are 'preparing £59m bid to sign Bernardo Silva from Man City' after Barcelona talks break down - Daily Mail
articles.description: Barcelona are also said to be interested in signing Silva, but their ongoing financial issues have hampered the possibility of a move, with the club still yet to register new-signing Jules Kounde.
articles.content:
PSG are reportedly set to launch a £59.1million bid to sign Portuguese midfielder Bernardo Silva from Manchester City.
